title: Sermon on the Mount: Prayer
description:
Readings from:
Matthew 6:5-15
Today's passages were read by Devi Abraham, a freelance writer and the co-host of Where Do We Go From Here? a podcast that untangles sexual ethics for a new generation of Christians.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
